Html:
Hi,

I'm wondering if I can merge column headers with the new WPF Datagrid control.
Are there any samples available?

Thanks a lot!

Hi catamount,

This feature is not built-in, but it should be extensible.  We are looking into creating a sample for this but it is not available yet and unfortunately I do not have an expected timeframe - when it is done, though, you can expect to find a link for it under the Tips & Tricks section: http://www.codeplex.com/wpf/Wiki/View.aspx?title=Tips%20%26%20Tricks

Thanks!
Samantha
